articles.title: Hilton to debut new hotel in Singapore – its largest in Asia-Pacific - CNA
articles.description: A conversion from the current Mandarin Orchard Singapore, the 1,080-room Hilton Singapore Orchard will open in January 2022.

articles.title: World passes 4 million COVID deaths as Asia battles fresh outbreaks - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: GENEVA, Switzerland - More than four million people have now died from Covid-19, the World Health Organization said on Wednesday, as many rich nations prepare to loosen restrictions even as countries in Asia battle surging infections.
